title: Your phone at a glance
answer:
In any screen, you can: 

 Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110483) to return to the previous screen or exit an application. 

 Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110484) to return to the home screen. 

 Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110485) to open the latest application list. 

 Press the power key to turn off or on the screen. You can press and hold the power key for over 10s to start the power-off menu. 

 Press the power key and the volume down key together to take a screenshot. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110486)

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110487)
